docComment:
/**
 * Handle MongoDB connections into Subito micro services
 *
 * @packageDocumentation
 */
name: subito-connector-mongodb

members.docComment:
/**
 * Create a new MongoDB connection
 *
 * @param link - MongoDB server link
 *
 * @param dbName - Name of the mongodb database
 *
 * @param params - Connection parameters
 *
 * @param options - Connection options
 *
 * @example
 * ```
 * new MongoDBConnector(
 *    'mongodb://mongodb:27017/',
 *    'subito',
 *    {
 *      authSource: 'admin',
 *      replicaSet: 'rs0',
 *    }
 * );
 * ```
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: MongoDBConnector

members.docComment:
/**
 * Connect to the DB
 *
 * @returns 
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: connect

members.docComment:
/**
 * Get the connection
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: get

members.docComment:
/**
 * MongoDB helper that can be usefull for some stuff.
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: MongoDBHelper

members.docComment:
/**
 * Get a pipeline matching your filters
 *
 * @param filters - Filters you want apply into the pipeline
 *
 * @returns 
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: getFilterPipeline

members.docComment:
/**
 * Create a new mongo ID
 *
 * @param toString - Instead of create a mongo.ObjectId(), set to true to receive a string ID
 *
 * @returns 
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: newMongoId

members.docComment:
/**
 * Class to implements the cursor paginator pattern
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * Specs by relayjs {@link https://relay.dev/graphql/connections.htm} Default cusor is based on the "createdAt" field, you can anything that sortable & unique as "slug"
 *
 * @param args - Configure the paginator
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: MongoDBPaginator

excerptTokens.text: constructor({ first, last, before, after, filters, }:

members.docComment:
/**
 * Get the paginator result
 *
 * @param docs - List of raw mongodb documents
 *
 * @returns 
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: get

members.docComment:
/**
 * Get the cursor value from a doc
 *
 * @param doc - The doc used to create the cursor
 *
 * @returns 
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: getDocCursor

members.docComment:
/**
 * Get the pipeline to use for the aggregation
 *
 * @param pipeline - Custom pipeline used to match a sub-selection of docs
 *
 * @param reverse - Set to true if you want to sort by desc
 *
 * @returns 
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: getPipeline

members.docComment:
/**
 * Set a custom cursor
 *
 * @param input - Configuration of the new cursor
 *
 * @returns 
 *
 * @example
 * ```
 * // Use the "slug" field as cursor
 * paginator.setCursor({ field: 'slug', type: 'string' });
 * ```
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: setCursor

members.docComment:
/**
 * Define page info from results
 *
 * @param input - The data needed to calculate page info
 *
 * @returns 
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: setPageInfo

members.docComment:
/**
 * Check if the doc can be inserted into the DB
 *
 * @param input - The new doc to checked
 *
 * @returns 
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: canBeInserted

members.docComment:
/**
 * Check if the doc can be updated
 *
 * @param input - Operation to execute
 *
 * @returns 
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: canBeUpdated

members.docComment:
/**
 * Insert a new doc
 *
 * @param input - The new doc to insert
 *
 * @returns 
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: createDoc

members.docComment:
/**
 * Create a list of documents
 *
 * @param arr - List of the docs to insert
 *
 * @returns 
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: createManyDocs
cursor

members.docComment:
/**
 * Delete a document by its ID (soft)
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * It makes a soft deletion, the doc still exists into the db with a field "deleteAt"
 *
 * @param id - ID of the document to delete
 *
 * @returns 
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: deleteById

members.docComment:
/**
 * Delete a list of document by their IDs (soft)
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * It makes a soft deletion, docs still exist into the db with a field "deleteAt"
 *
 * @param ids - An array of doc id
 *
 * @returns 
 */
members.name: deleteManyById

members.docComment:
/**
 * Get a list of paginated documents
 *
 * @param input - Define how you want to paginate
 *
 * @param pipeline - Custom pipeline to get a subset of docs
 *
 * @returns 
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: findByCursor

members.docComment:
/**
 * Find one doc by specifics fields
 *
 * @param fields - The fields to match
 *
 * @param options - Data source options
 *
 * @returns 
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: findOneByFields

members.docComment:
/**
 * Find a doc by its slug
 *
 * @param slug - The slug to match
 *
 * @param options - Data source options
 *
 * @returns 
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: findOneBySlug

members.docComment:
/**
 * Get the current date using Datte class from subito-lib
 *
 * @returns 
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: getDate

members.docComment:
/**
 * Delete a document by its ID (hard)
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * It removes the doc from the DB, still prefer a soft deletion with {@link Repository.deleteById}
 *
 * @param id - ID of the document to HARD delete
 *
 * @returns 
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: hardDeleteById

members.docComment:
/**
 * Delete a document by its ID (hard)
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * It removes docs from the DB, still prefer a soft deletion {@link Repository.deleteManyById}
 *
 * @param ids - An array of doc id
 *
 * @returns 
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: hardDeleteManyById

members.docComment:
/**
 * Add needed data to the doc before insertion
 *
 * @param doc - The doc to insert
 *
 * @returns 
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: prepareNewDoc

members.docComment:
/**
 * Update a doc with its id
 *
 * @param input - Input values
 *
 * @returns 
 *
 * @public
 */
members.name: updateDoc
